name: Crawler (Markus Glanzer)
description:
My contribution to Summerjam 2016. Standard shooter controls,

Of course there's stuff missing I would have liked in there.

Standard WASD+Mouse controls, pick up Milk bottles, reach the blue glowy cube, and try not to be eaten by sockmonsters.

The whole project is available on my Github

Music:

Robbero - Ghost Saga

Destinazione Altrove - Beat Down Babylon, Dysfunction Al Remix
